LanguageData.Spaceship.label: spaceship
LanguageData.Spaceship.description: A spaceship used by MiningCo. to maintain a link between ground operations and the orbital station orbiting around the planet.
LanguageData.SpaceshipCargo.label: cargo spaceship
LanguageData.SpaceshipCargo.description: A spaceship used by MiningCo. to convey bulk resources and materials.
LanguageData.SpaceshipDamaged.label: damaged spaceship
LanguageData.SpaceshipDamaged.description: A spaceship used by MiningCo. in various missions. This ship is damaged and need materials to begin repairs.
LanguageData.SpaceshipDispatcherDrop.label: dispatcher spaceship
LanguageData.SpaceshipDispatcherDrop.description: A spaceship used by MiningCo. to transport and dispatch expedition teams.
LanguageData.SpaceshipDispatcherPick.label: dispatcher spaceship
LanguageData.SpaceshipDispatcherPick.description: A spaceship used by MiningCo. to transport and dispatch expedition teams.
LanguageData.SpaceshipMedical.label: medical spaceship
LanguageData.SpaceshipMedical.description: A spaceship used by MiningCo. to assist ground operations. It provides medical assistance to nearby personnel.
